creations.name: Seknd
creations.subTitle: React Web Application
creations.details: You've got the match, but how do you find and plan the best date? This web application solves that question. Start a search utilizing the Ticketmaster and Yelp API and plan the day or night out with the drag n' drop scheduler.

creations.name: Grant Creates
creations.subTitle: Gatsby Portfolio Website
creations.details: Welcome to my digital forge! This is my portfolio site displaying different creations I've made. To achieve high performance and less bugs at runtime I decided to code this site in the Gatsby framework with TypeScript.
